title: BRIEF-Standard Bank Of South Africa Announces Increase In Issue Size Of Kiosbj Warrant
text:
BRIEF-Standard Bank Of South Africa Announces Increase In Issue Size Of Kiosbj Warrant

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 15:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Standard Bank Of South Africa Announces Increase In Issue Size Of Kiosbj Warrant Oct 24 (Reuters) - Standard Bank (JO: ) of South Africa Ltd : * INCREASE IN ISSUE SIZE OF KIOSBJ WARRANT FROM 100 MILLION TO 200 MILLION WITH EFFECT FROM COMMENCEMENT OF TRADE ON OCT. 25

BRIEF-Standard Bank Of South Africa Announces Increase In Issue Size Of Kiosbj Warrant
